sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello Trigger➛Leave Request Record➛Requested By➛Name,

Your Trigger➛Leave Request Record➛Leave Type requested on Trigger➛Leave Request Record➛Created has been approved,  you can proceed on leave from Trigger➛Leave Request Record➛Start Date to Trigger➛Leave Request Record➛End Date.

Thank You

Trigger➛Leave Request Record➛Requested By➛Manager➛Name

The Trigger➛Leave Request Record➛Leave Type you requested on the  Trigger➛Leave Request Record➛Created has been rejected.

Thank You
